entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
